bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Etiological Agent. of water evil having accumulated in the human body. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 41: 胎間 水氣，子滿體腫者，此由脾胃虛弱，臟腑之間有停水，而挾以妊娠故也 , “If during pregnancy water qi fills the child and causes the body to swell, this is because of a depletion and weakness of the spleen and stomach. Stagnant water has accumulated in the region of the depots and palaces and is held there because of the pregnancy”.

②Reference to stagnant water in the natural environment. Ben cao shi yi 本草拾遺 Substance Entry yin shui liu quan 陰水流泉：五月六月勿飲澤中停水 , “During the 5th and the 6th months do not drink stagnant water from the swamps”.
